refnamediv.refpurpose: compile the leap seconds table used by the Bernstein TAI library

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: leapsecs compiles the leapsecs.dat file, that is required by the Bernstein TAI library, from a source text file. It reads the source text file on its standard input, and writes the compiled data file on its standard output.

The source file is published by DanielJ.Bernstein, amongst many others. The only lines that leapsecs cares about begin with a + in the first column, followed by a date in ISO 8604 form. The leap second written to the table is an (assumed) positive leap second on the last second of that date.

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: leapsecs was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's libtai toolset in 1999.
